fields.name: Day... 9?:
fields.value:
I can no longer keep track of the days. The mountains continued to move, and one of them somehow managed to grow in size. It walked between me and the sun, and darkness fell. Once it moved, the sun did not return. I have observed for 24 hours, and the sun has not come back. I will now be labeling these entries by the entry number, not the day.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose somebody to not shine outside of their house. They will be unable to vote for 2 days.
- **Sun Frozen Over** - At night, freeze, coldsnapping and instantly end the next day. One use, usable starting Night 3.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who don't submit to the endless winter.
